page.title: 19ATTITUDES
page.content: To find out what people thought of Stanford we conducted a survey on the entertainment, shopping facilities, medical facilities and public transport.On the whole, most people thought that Stanford was a reasonable place to live, although everyone complained about the lack of entertainment.Most people thought that there could be a greater variety of shops and an improvement in the ones we have.The younger age group did not comment on the medical facilities, although the older age group stressed that there could be some improvement. The O.A.P.s that we talked to complained about the lack of bus services.Generally, we found that everyone wanted more entertainment, the most popular suggestion being a cinema, and that Stanford is a clean and safe place to live.
